name: Mardi Gras Celebration
short_description: Join us for a Mardi Gras Celebration at the gates hotel //24 North Hotel. We’ll have great New Orleans inspired drink specials,
long_description: Join us for a Mardi Gras Celebration at the gates hotel //24 North Hotel. We’ll have great New Orleans inspired drink specials, food specials, beads and masks! Buy a drink and get a free mask! Join us at the bar for a fun celebration and some great music! Music from 4-7pm
